# PED::SET_PED_KEEP_TASK

## Summary
Sets a ped will keep thier script created task when the mission ends or MARK_CHAR_AS_NO_LONGER_NEEDED is called

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** keepTasksFlag
